name: test_NAF_4_8_0_comment_under_enrolled_program
description:
Test Case: NAF-110
    As a user I should be able to check programs details
    Scenario: Comment under enrolled program
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to the Programs tab
    3. Click on a program card
    4. If not enrolled, enroll first
    5. Click Day 1 video
    6. Click comments entry
    7. Click write a comment
    8. Enter comment and send
    9. Verify comment is posted
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-110
As a user I should be able to check programs details
Scenario: Comment under enrolled program
Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to the Programs tab
3. Click on a program card
4. If not enrolled, enroll first
5. Click Day 1 video
6. Click comments entry
7. Click write a comment
8. Enter comment and send
9. Verify comment is posted
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Comment was not posted successfully
assert False
 +  where False = <bound method ProgramDetailPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.program_detail_page.ProgramDetailPage object at 0x1076b3450>>('Test comment dJ8eHH')
 +    where <bound method ProgramDetailPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.program_detail_page.ProgramDetailPage object at 0x1076b3450>> = <pages.android.program_detail_page.ProgramDetailPage object at 0x1076b3450>.is_comment_present
